metadata.title: CVE-2024-28882 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
only call schedule_exit() once (on a given peer). Security scope: anauthenticated client can make the server "keep the session" even when theserver has been told to disconnect this client

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-28882` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.6.9-1ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.9-1ubuntu4.1').
